title: Longest Common Subsequence
statement: Given two strings S1 and S2, find the length of their longest common subsequence. A subsequence is a sequence derived by deleting some characters without changing the order.
input_format:
First line contains string S1.
Second line contains string S2.
constraints:
1 <= |S1|, |S2| <= 1000
Strings contain only lowercase English letters.
